hailstoneProject

Class HailstoneCloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • hailstoneProject.HailstoneCloud

  • public class HailstoneCloud
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to store multiple hailstone sequences and perform statistical calculations on stored hailstones.
    Version:
    18 Sept 2014
    Author:
    Jason Bladow jcb2837
